description: Jesse and Jessica pick up their two best friends at the airport. On they way back to the resort they spot a hitchhiker on the side of the road. They all think he is hot and decide to pick him up and play a little game. Natassia and Ariel are ready for some fun. Ass, Gas or Cash, no one rides for free...
title: Roadtrip part 2 "The Hitchhiker"
